reviewText: This collection of holiday movies was extremely heart-warming! There's something for everyone in the family to find funny and entertaining.
I only liked a couple of these movies.  One was more for kids, and another one continuously used language that I didn't care for.
I loved the collection. Fun to watch on a lazy day. Good stories and to have them on just two discs makes for easy storage.

Holiday in Handcuffs is one of my favorite Christmas movies to watch and my son likes Snowglobe so it is great to have in one place.  Hadn't seen a couple of the others and got to watch, which I did like them also.  I would recommend it.

I honestly ordered this pack just for Holiday in Handcuffs.  This is one of my top Christmas movies I have to watch each year.  I love how there is just enough comedy and seriousness in dealing with family issues+relationships.  This pack offers some nice lift your spirits and hope movies.
This is a wonderful collection of holiday movies. I highly recommend it  They are full of humor, romance and Christmas spirit.

Any Christmas movies is worth owning.  This set has 6 really great Christmas movies.  I like the protective "can-like" packaging.  It's a terrific gift for any age.  The only thing I don't like about owning your own Christmas DVDs is that very few have closed captioning.  Sometimes it's difficult for me to make out all of the words.  I even have an hearing aid and I still have difficulty sometimes.
why do you not have these for instant video rent?????  I would rent them from you.  I think many would.

I purchased this DVD in August.  I didn't get around to watching it until the first week in November when the Christmas season was starting up.  One of the DVDs is scratched and I am unable to play it.  I am not able to exchange it since it is past the Amazon time limit for exchanges.
GREAT MOVIES. THEY MAKE YOU LAUGH AND CRY.
Great addition to the holiday movie collection. I enjoy these comedic Christmas movies during the holidays. Cheesy, in the best way!
Awesome! So exited about this set! Plan on. Watching for Christmas in July!
Great movies! Came quick. Although they aren't cased appropriately. They're just sitting in a type of box on top of each other with little to no protection, one disc was scratched.
great loved them
good

I was so excited to get this as stocking stuffers for several people, as well as a copy for myself, since I had already seen a few of the movies on there and knew they were really good.  But luckily, before Christmas I decided to watch my copy and I was so surprised that I could only watch it in standard format, which made it look stretched and weird on my tv.  I tried many things to get the picture right, but it looked just as bad no matter what I did.  I sent the unused copies back and decided not to give them as gifts.  I would just order the movies individually, since they seem to have a better format for watching on a new, large screen tv.  (Holiday in Handcuffs and Christmas in Boston - are the best on the set anyway)
excellent Holiday movies
Love these movies!
cute movies
My favorite Christmas movies!  Wish the picture quality was better.
Pretty much what I expected from ABC..funny, light-hearted movies that I will watch each Christmas season
wife loves the movies.
Good movies!
Great set
Lol this movie was so hilarious it starts out as though it's going to be a crazy show but it's really hilarious I must see movie to get a big laugh.
thank you so very much. It came in the best shape ever. It was a great and pleasing surpprice for it can so quickly. Thank's again. ART
Fast Service - Product is as it was described and pictured! I will shop with them again in the future :)!

If you are deaf or hearing impaired, like myself, it's important to note that these movies Do Not have subtitles! In this day and age, especially for ABC Family movies and all age groups they play to, but I don't understand why they aren't, but found out the hard way when I purchased it them. I'm really disappointed.
FAMILY ENJOYED MOST MOVIES
Like all of these movies- each one is a joy to watch and enjoyable to sit down and watch something that the whole family can watch.  The movies show what is important in life and it is not money.
I'm a sucker for Christmas movies.  Love the combo-pack.  It offers a nice variety of family-appropriate Christmas movies to get everyone in the mood for the Holidays!
good
I was thrilled to receive this Christmas Collection 6-pack. These are movies I love to watch over and over each holiday season! Great for family time! Feel good movies for adults and children alike!
My daughter loves this movie. I had it and ordered it for her for Christmas.. Great movie!! :) It is a Great buy!
All movies were exactly what you'd expect. Funny, light hearted and well worth the time.  Only problem- scratched DVD arrived so holidays in handcuffs jumped. But 5 out of 6 was not bad.
I was very satisfied with this purchase.  I enjoy these kinds of movies and with this being a six pack I have been able to enjoy this for hours.
it was perfect..just what my daughter wanted and we got alot of movies for a great price..movies that we cant find at the store
Me and the family are a big fan of abc family they always have great movies to watch as a family
Love old movies
Fun, joyful show! Wish Hallmark offered Handcuffed for Christmas movie on their Hallmark channel.
Love It
Cute movies.  Right price! Quick shipping.

I was very disappointed not to get my DVD's in the tin box holder displayed in the picture.  I had this once but let my Sister borrow the set and she thought I gave it to her, of course I couldn't ask for it back. I finally broke to treat myself,  and payed quite a bit more for this collection but was looking forward to having them in the tin. Bummer, just got plastic dvd cases.  I love all the movies, just really wanted what I ordered.
I loved it
Good collection of fun Lighthearted Christmas Movies to help get you in the mood for some Festive Cheer!!!
These are so funny. You will like them all.

Delivered on Time.
Was what I was told and wanted.  Great !!!!
Packging was very good.

After researching for the widescreen format of Holiday in Handcuffs, this was the one to buy (see following links for comparative sites):

http://www.swapadvd.com/ABC-Family-Christmas-Collection-6/dvd/298151/
http://www.ebay.com/itm/ABC-Family-Christmas-Collection-6-Pack-Christmas-Cupid-Christmas-In-Boston-S-/161815293842

As I was expecting the 6 movie TIN DVD case (as advertised on the item), I received 3 DVD Sleeves (2 of which are Full Screen, the last being Widescreen), which was a combination of the following items:

http://www.amazon.com/Holiday-Handcuffs-Snow-Brain-Freeze/dp/B0055HK6XE/ref=sr_1_3?ie=UTF8&qid=1449790568&sr=8-3&keywords=holiday+in+handcuffs
http://www.amazon.com/Santa-Baby-Christmas-Boston-Snowglobe/dp/B0055HK6Y8/ref=sr_1_2?ie=UTF8&qid=1449790583&sr=8-2&keywords=santa+baby+2
http://www.amazon.com/Christmas-Cupid-Christina-Milian/dp/B0055HK6VQ/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1449790631&sr=8-1&keywords=christmas+cupid
